description:
A FREE, personalized city guide covering 30+ different categories deemed essential for anyone living or traveling in London. 

By aggregating everything you need into one app, MyCityWay London helps you quickly and easily…
 
• Move: Find local transportation options, schedules and routes
• Stay Current: Access real-time local news, weather, daily deals PLUS a live picture-driven HeatMap to the most popular places right this moment
• Shop: Discover the best boutiques by category, neighbourhood and location and find sales and deals close by
• Play: Purchase tickets to tours and attractions across the city and identify free activities, including cultural centers, landmarks, museums, art galleries and parks
• Eat: Choose the best restaurants by neighbourhood or cuisine, read reviews, make reservations and get directions
• Party: Learn about the best London offers after-hours – nightclubs, lounges, sports bars or comedy clubs
• Take care of business: Pinpoint nearby bathrooms and WiFi hotspots

Enjoy instant access to everything that’s happening around you, in real-time, with just the tap of a tile. MyCityWay technology learns with you, delivering personalized information around-the-clock.

Users can select their own dashboard of content (snapshot) and set alerts for things that interest them and rate what they have done, helping the app provide a more tailored experience with each use. MyCityWay harnesses information from hundreds of content partners, cross-references it to ensure validity and instantaneously sorts according to users’ needs and preferences by uniquely marrying location, intent, timing and information from their social graph. MyCityWay uses big data to apply intelligent situational awareness, providing the optimal customer experience.

A free, one-time download and you have everything you need to live in or visit London housed in this single, easy-to-use app. Get around better, faster, smarter.
